00029 
00030 /**
00031  * Language class
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 final class tx_oop_Lang_Getter
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * 
00042      */
00043     private static $_instances           = array();
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * 
00047      */
00048     private static $_nbInstances         = 0;
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * The name of the default instance
00052      */
00053     private static $_defaultInstanceName = 'EXT:oop/lang/lgl.xml';
00054     
00055     /**
00056      * 
00057      */
00058     private static $_currentLang         = '';
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * 
00062      */
00063     private $_labels                     = array();
00064     
00065     /**
00066      * 
00067      */
00068     private $_instanceName               = '';
00069     
00070     /**
00071      * 
00072      */
00073     private $_langFilePath               = '';
00074     
00075     /**
00076      * 
00077      */
00078     private function __construct( $langFile )
00079     {
00080         $this->_instanceName = $langFile;
00081         
00082         $this->_langFilePath = t3lib_div::getFileAbsFileName( $langFile );
00083         
00084         if( $this->_langFilePath === '' ) {
00085             
00086             throw new tx_oop_Lang_Getter_Exception(
00087                 'Language file not found (' . $langFile . ')',
00088                 tx_oop_Lang_Getter_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_LANG_FILE
00089             );
00090         }
00091         
00092         try {
00093             
00094             $xml = simplexml_load_file( $this->_langFilePath );
00095             
00096             foreach( $xml->data->languageKey as $langSection ) {
00097                 
00098                 $this->_labels[ ( string )$langSection[ 'index' ] ] = array();
00099                 
00100                 foreach( $langSection as $label ) {
00101                     
00102                     $this->_labels[ ( string )$langSection[ 'index' ] ][ ( string )$label[ 'index' ] ] = ( string )$label;
00103                 }
00104             }
00105             
00106         } catch( Exception $e ) {
00107             
00108             throw new tx_oop_Lang_Getter_Exception(
00109                 $e->getMessage(),
00110                 tx_oop_Lang_Getter_Exception::EXCEPTION_BAD_XML
00111             );
00112         }
00113     }
00114     
00115     /**
00116      * 
00117      */
00118     public function __get( $name )
00119     {
00120         if( $this->_labels[ $this->_currentLang ][ $name ] ) {
00121             
00122             return $this->_labels[ $this->_currentLang ][ $name ];
00123             
00124         } elseif( isset( $this->_labels[ 'default' ][ $name ] ) ) {
00125             
00126             return $this->_labels[ 'default' ][ $name ];
00127             
00128         } elseif( $this->_instanceName != self::$_defaultInstanceName
00129                   && $label = self::$_instances[ self::$_defaultInstanceName ]->$name
00130         ) {
00131             
00132             return $label;
00133             
00134         } else {
00135             
00136             return '[LABEL: ' . $name . ']';
00137         }
00138     }
00139     
00140     /**
00141      * 
00142      */
00143     private static function _setCurrentLanguage()
00144     {
00145         if( defined( 'TYPO3_MODE' ) && TYPO3_MODE === 'BE' ) {
00146             
00147             self::$_currentLang = $GLOBALS[ 'LANG' ]->lang;
00148             
00149         } elseif( defined( 'TYPO3_MODE' ) && TYPO3_MODE === 'FE' ) {
00150             
00151             self::$_currentLang = $GLOBALS[ 'TSFE' ]->config[ 'config' ][ 'language' ];
00152         }
00153     }
00154     
00155     /**
00156      * 
00157      */
00158     public static function getInstance( $langFile )
00159     {
00160         if( self::$_nbInstances === 0 ) {
00161             
00162             self::_setCurrentLanguage();
00163             
00164             self::$_instances[ self::$_defaultInstanceName ] = new self( self::$_defaultInstanceName );
00165             
00166             self::$_nbInstances++;
00167         }
00168         
00169         if( !isset( self::$_instances[ $langFile ] ) ) {
00170             
00171             self::$_instances[ $langFile ] = new self( $langFile );
00172             
00173             self::$_nbInstances++;
00174             
00175         }
00176         
00177         return self::$_instances[ $langFile ];
00178     }
00179 }
